name: ZD
description:
I have a dream of making a MultiplayerFPS like this. Yes, I'm using asset just to test things out to see if it work, but I actually put a lot of heart and soul into this.

It's pretty light weighted, so give it a try and it FREE too.

This is the stable-st version so far. Contact me if you want to be part of the testing phase.

Email: EllisTheMiracle@gmail.com

Please name your email something that easy to recognize. Thanks.

Note: Remember, this is just a prototype, so everything is placeholder. I even use the winning theme from Modern Warfare. I'll probably change it when I'm thinking of charging for the game.
